channel.title: Students and Events
channel.description: This menu contains multiple galleries of students and events!

item.title: ONU Astronomy Club
item.description: Click here to view images of the ONU Astro Club over the years, from Spring 2007 to Spring 2022!
item.media:description: Click here to view images of the ONU Astro Club over the years, from Spring 2007 to Spring 2022!

item.title: Kitt Peak & MDM
item.description: An ONU student had the opportunity to visit Kitt Peak and MDM Observatory in 2012 - a premier astronomical experience!
item.media:description: An ONU student had the opportunity to visit Kitt Peak and MDM Observatory in 2012 - a premier astronomical experience!

item.title: 2012 Venus Transit
item.description: Click here for a few images of the ONU Observatory's public event for the 2012 transit of Venus across the Sun!
item.media:description: Click here for a few images of the ONU Observatory's public event for the 2012 transit of Venus across the Sun!

item.title: 2017 Solar Eclipse
item.description: Click here to view images from the ONU Observatory's public solar eclipse viewing event in 2017!
item.media:description: Click here to view images from the ONU Observatory's public solar eclipse viewing event in 2017!
